attributes.title: Stole my money 😔
attributes.review: I just wanted to see trump oppar but the app got my credit card info on spent all my money on rainbow extra thicc dildos 😢 please give my money back😢😢😢

attributes.title: this app made me cry
attributes.review: i went on this app because i wanted to see his plans. but then i started getting random texts as soon as i downloaded and it was saying that trump and his tiny pp we’re gonna come steal me from my house and make me work in the garden of the white house. and then he was gonna attack me with his cheeto fingers. i fear for my life

attributes.title: Literally died when I opened the app. No joke I’m dead:(
attributes.review: What’s up fellow gamers. I came here to let you know that this app causes small pp and projectile vomiting. Swagalicious. Don’t download this crap😈✌🏻🤮🌶🧚🏻‍♀️🤩🍆🥰🙈

attributes.title: Wow...

attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.title: Ratatouille 💅🏻✨😌
attributes.review:
ok so I downloaded this app to see what my girlfriends, Karen and Linda, were looking at. When i first opened it, I was not appealed. There was A SWEET POTATO WITH A FACE AND WIG STARING AT ME😤😤😤😤😤😤😤!!!!!!!. I hope Linda and Karen help me report this to the government 😤😠!. 
     
                                     with rage!.... love sherran🤗

attributes.title: The App
attributes.review: This app was terrible I was trying to order pepperoni, little did I know I was in the trump aisle. This app is very bad and almost made me puke upon downloading it. Also trump has no lips how will he get a kiss kiss? VERY UGLY NO KISS FOR HIM.

attributes.title: Very bad!!
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see trumps plans and everything, but it’s so bad and makes my phone lag. I hate it so much.

attributes.title: Disappointed and dissatisfied
attributes.review:
It was lagging, hard to navigate and it didn’t work at all. Complete waste of space.
 0.1 stars

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: it keeps crashing my phone tbh I just don’t like seeing that orange on my screen. you did that ❤️💗💓💕🧚🏼 don’t do it again though 😌🦋✨💗💓💝💕
